column4: somthing happened to my feisty install and all the windows are at the top left with no way to grab them any one know what's up with that? or does ctr + m work or what happened?
what is the command for moving a window? like alt + m or whatever?
first un maximize by pressing keyboard    alt + f4    then move with alt  + f7
u r welcome.  uhhh i don't see your screen .  did u try to reset the x server config.    try this command...      sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg      just hit enter to answer all questions
